titleStmt.title: By his Maiesties Commissioners for Virginia
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. His Majesties Commissioners for Virginia.

notesStmt.note: A notice of the weekly sittings of the King's Commissioners, who were appointed by the Privy Council in July 1624, after the Virginia Company was dissolved--STC.
Identified as STC 24837 on UMI microfilm.
Actually a bifolium, printed on 1/2 the sheet only.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
